ygData.subject: RE: Graphics/Bandwidth (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh, reminds me of a tournament I ran with my clan when I was still playing Q2. I changed all the .Ent files to really silly things and made a tournament
ygData.messageBody:
> Quake2, where all maps are in your
> computer, but the .ent files can
> change with each server you join.

Heh, reminds me of a tournament I ran with my clan when I was still playing
Q2. I changed all the .Ent files to really silly things and made a
tournament out of it. Nobody ever knew what the next map was going to be
like. =)

It's a shame there's no "local only" type of EQ server emulator. I'd really
LOVE to be able to roam Norrath for a day or two with absolutely NO mobs
anywhere.. Just to see the beauty of some of the things they've created that
I'll probably never be able to see while playing..
